title: Why Trump and these MAGA allies are trying to resurrect the 'R-word'
shortDescription: Trump's foes and friends have noticed a revival of the term, which advocates say is harmful to Americans with mental disabilities.

title: Trump cuts include slashing access to disability lawyers, advocates say
shortDescription: The Trump administration proposed cuts for state-based legal services for disabled people, as rights advocates say DOJ pushed out many of its lawyers.

title: Trump pledges retaliation after 3 Americans killed
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said the U.S. will retaliate after 3 U.S. service personnel were killed in Syria.

title: GOP senator touts book promoting bleach treatment for autism, cancer
shortDescription: The Wisconsin lawmaker has been a supporter of Pierre Kory, a controversial physician who advocated for a "wonder drug" during the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: Trump says US will retaliate after soldiers, interpreter killed in Syria
shortDescription: Three others were wounded, Pentagon spokesman Sean Parnell said.

title: Maduro responds to Trump strike threats
shortDescription: Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro denounced Trump’s threats of land strikes after the U.S. seized an oil tanker near Venezuela.

title: Pinched by higher prices, many Trump voters say: Don't blame him
shortDescription: Affordability is front and center in voters’ minds as both parties gear up for next year’s congressional midterm elections.

title: Inside look at how ICE operates in Trump's America
shortDescription: Across the country, ICE officers accustomed to operating below the radar have been thrust into the spotlight by Trump's aggressive deportation orders.

title: House GOP proposes health care bill to cut costs but Democrats oppose
shortDescription: House Republicans offer health care bill without extending Obamacare subsidies but Democrats oppose the proposal.

title: Democrats will definitely win the House in 2026, says Pelosi
shortDescription: Zohran Mamdani is not the face of the new Democratic party, says Representative Nancy Pelosi. Nobody is, yet

title: Trump reacts to Epstein photos

title: Why Trump is upset over Indiana and hopes a Republican loses race
shortDescription: President Trump told reporters he hopes Indiana's GOP Senate leader loses his next primary race. Here's why.

title: Trump may ease marijuana restrictions
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is considering an order to reclassify marijuana, easing restrictions and expanding research opportunities.

title: Who's releasing the Epstein photos? Dems say they have 95K images.

shortDescription: The lawsuit claims that construction has already begun but the White House has repeatedly said that is not the case.

title: Trump weighing order that would ease access to marijuana
shortDescription: Marijuana currently is classified as a Schedule I drug, which the DEA describes as a substance with no "medical use and a high potential for abuse."

title: Trump reacts to Indiana's rejection of GOP map
